Text:
What other uploaders should learn from you is that they should be linking their torrents to various trackers while uploading...look what happened when TPB went down and the trackers which unfortunately are still down :(

Your torrents came as a winner in terms of seeders and peers and worked fine while most of the others struggled ( with only DHT helping them out )

openbittorrent and denis stalker are working again ( they were down too if u hv noticed initially ) but all TPB trackers are still down.

i have about 9 trackers + the piratebay. and one of those trackers is for a russian website that i have not figured out how to upload to yet. torrents 
.ru

Cheers

Joe
